name: Lost Frisbee LudumDare 48 Deeper and Deeper
name_original: Lost Frisbee LudumDare 48 Deeper and Deeper
description:
Tom se trouve projeté dans un monde loufoque.

Sera t-il contourner tous les obstacles qui se dressent devant lui afin de mettre la main sur son jouet fétiche ?

- - - - - -

Tom finds himself thrown into a crazy world.

Will he be able to get around all the obstacles in front of him in order to get his hands on his favourite toy ?
